page_size.label: PDF page size
page_size.comment: This sets: Packing Sheets, Invoices, Picklists.

shelvingpos.label: Position of custom attributes
shelvingpos.comment:
Where to position custom product attributes on the picklists.
Default: Columns

override_address_format_yn.label: Override default address layout?
override_address_format_yn.comment: Change the layout of shipping addresses

address_format.label: Layout template
address_format.comment:
Structure: {if X}{X},|{/if}
Can use these codes:
{prefix}{name}{firstname}{lastname}{suffix}{company}{street}{city}{postcode}{country}
{street} - All lines of 'street'
{street1} - 1st line of 'street'
{street2} - 2nd line of 'street'
{region} - uses state abbreviation if available, else full name
{REGION} - all-caps (region only)
{region_full} - uses full state name
{region_code} - uses state abbreviation only
{COUNTRY} - all-caps (country only)
| = line break
If you're outputting Zebra Labels don't forget to set the address format in that section as well.

address_countryskip.label: Hide this 'country name'
address_countryskip.comment: eg. Put your country, then only overseas orders will have country added

bold_address_format_yn.label: Bold last line in page-base shipping addresses?

bold_topaddress_format_yn.label: Bold last line in page-top shipping addresses?

remove_accents_from_chars_yn.label: Remove accents from letters in address?
remove_accents_from_chars_yn.comment: [No] Some couriers (like Royal Mail) require no accents in shipping labels.

date_format.label: Date format
date_format.comment:
Example formats:
  • "M j, Y" // Jul 29, 2015 (default)
  • "F j, Y, g:i a" // March 10, 2001, 5:16 pm
  • "m.d.y" // 03.10.01
Read more : www.php.net/date

custom_fonts_yn.label: Customise fonts/colours?

callout_color.label: Callout colour
callout_color.comment:
Set to the most prominent colour in your logo. [#8AC371]
(Used for title borders).

callout_special_font.label: Seeing tofu : ▯?
callout_special_font.comment:
If your PDFs print with missing or tofu (▯) characters, set this to 'Yes'.
Setting this to 'Yes' will make your PDFs about 0.4mb bigger.
If that doesn't work for you: set 'Customise fonts' to 'Yes'; then set 'Use non-roman characters to 'Yes'; then try the other font families.

font_custom_company.label: Custom font file
font_custom_company.comment:
Upload a .ttf or .otf font file
'Font style' settings are ignored with custom fonts

font_custom_subtitles.label: Custom font file
font_custom_subtitles.comment:
Upload a .ttf or .otf font file
'Font style' settings are ignored with custom fonts

gift_override_yn.label: Force gift message font?
gift_override_yn.comment: [No] If set to yes, gift messages will print with this font.

gift_image_yn.label: Add flare to gift messages?
gift_image_yn.comment: Makes gift orders a bit happier-looking by adding a special image on the message box.

shipment_details_bold_label.label: Bold 'Extra shipping details' labels?
shipment_details_bold_label.comment: Applies to Packing Sheets and Invoices, in the section which shows shipping method etc.

background_color_product.label: Packing Sheet Products : Separating Line Color

pickpack_picklogo.label: Show logo on picklists?
pickpack_picklogo.comment: Uses header logo from Packing Sheet

trim_names_yn.label: Truncate items to fit in columns?

filter_virtual_products_yn.label: Hide Virtual and Downloadable products from PDFs?

pickpack_split_supplier_yn.label: Filter/split by supplier?
pickpack_split_supplier_yn.comment: This will create different pick lists per supplier

pickpack_supplier_attribute.label: Supplier attribute
pickpack_supplier_attribute.comment: Attribute code for supplier data; Default: supplier

pickpack_supplier_login.label: Split by logged-in user?
pickpack_supplier_login.comment:
Output only these suppliers (Hide/Grey-out others)
Leave blank to auto-split all suppliers by the 'supplier attribute'.
Use this format:
magento-username:supplier-attribute;
magento-usernameB:supplier-attributeB;
admin(your-username):all;

pickpack_supplier_options.label: Others?
pickpack_supplier_options.comment: If supplier 'logged in', do what with other suppliers products?

combined_orders_grouped_by_id_yn.label: 'Combined Packing Sheet/Invoice' grouped by Order ID?
combined_orders_grouped_by_id_yn.comment: This will slow down PDF generation by a lot, so leave 'No' unless you really need it

erp_pdf_replace_yn.label: Replace Default ERP Packing Sheet with the one from pickPack?

pack_logo.label: Image file
pack_logo.comment:
'Normal' Dimensions: 269pt x 41pt @ 300dpi
'Full-Width' Dimensions: 557pt(A4)|574pt(US Letter) x 50pt @ 300dpi
All : non-interlaced and non-transparent .png

pickpack_logo_position.label: Position
pickpack_logo_position.comment: Default: Left (if right, turn off barcodes, addresses; if full-width no company address)

pickpack_company_address_group1.label: Address text, Group 1
pickpack_company_address_group1.comment: This needs the shipEasy extension to work

pickpack_company_address_group2.label: Address text, Group 2
pickpack_company_address_group2.comment: This needs the shipEasy extension to work

pickpack_company_address_group3.comment: This needs the shipEasy extension to work

pickpack_company_address_group_default.comment: This needs the shipEasy extension to work

pickpack_company_address.comment: Goes on the right of the header logo

pickpack_company_address_logoright.label: Address text
pickpack_company_address_logoright.comment: Goes on the top-left of the page

pickpack_title_pattern.label: Title text
pickpack_title_pattern.comment:
Structure:
{{if order_date}}Order date:{{order_date}}{{endif order_date}}
Can use:
order_date, invoice_date, printing_date, order_id, invoice_id, marketplace_order_id,ebay_sales_number

capitalize_label_yn.label: Reformat?
capitalize_label_yn.comment: According to the USPS all addresses should be capitalised to improve delivery time and accuracy

address_pad.label: Padding
address_pad.comment: Exactly position top address (eg. for envelope window)

shipping_billing_title_position.label: Shipping/Billing title position
shipping_billing_title_position.comment: Tip : Use short title(s) if you choose 'beside'

billing_phone_yn_in_shipping_details.label: Show billing phone under shipping address ?

pickpack_show_qrcode_pattern.label: Pattern text
pickpack_show_qrcode_pattern.comment:
Structure:
{{if order_date}}Order date:{{order_date}}{{endif order_date}}
Can use:
{{order_id}},{{order_date}},{{invoice_id}},{{invoice_date}},{{printed_date}},{{marketplace_order_id}},{{ebay_sales_number}},{{shipping_lastname}},{{shipping_name}},{{postcode}},{{customer_id}},Fixed text

shipment_details_yn.label: Show extra shipping details?
shipment_details_yn.comment: Puts in total weight, shipping carrier, payment method

shipping_detail_pad.label: Padding
shipping_detail_pad.comment: Exactly position shipping detail (eg. for envelope window)

shipment_details_weight_addon.label: Amount to add
shipment_details_weight_addon.comment: This will be added to each order's total weight

shipment_details_pallet_weight.label: Pallet 'go' weight
shipment_details_pallet_weight.comment: Min. weight to hide shipment method and put 'Pallet'

shipment_details_cardinfo.label: Detailed CC info?
shipment_details_cardinfo.comment: Not recommended... Use at your own risk...

shipment_details_custgroup_filter.label: Hide these groups :
shipment_details_custgroup_filter.comment: Comma-separated list of customer group names where you don't want the group name shown

shipeasyflagselect.comment: If you're using shipEasy, and have setup any of the 3 custom flag columns, you can show the value.

order_custom_attribute_filter.label: Filter out these attributes
order_custom_attribute_filter.comment: Add 1 per line, exact attribute labels which you *don’t* want to show

non_store_pickup_yn.label: Show fixed-text for non-Store-Pickup orders?
non_store_pickup_yn.comment: Adds a field for shipping methods that don't come from WSA Store Pickup

non_store_pickup_showdatetime.label: Show pickup date/time on same line?

store_pickup_hide_shipping_yn.label: Hide Shipping Method for Store-Pickup orders?

pickpack_return_address_yn.comment: Goes at page base - good for integrated labels

pickpack_logo.comment: Dimensions 180pt x 120pt @ 300dpi : non-interlaced and non-transparent .png

page_1_products_y_cutoff.label: Page 1 Product-lines cutoff Y-pos
page_1_products_y_cutoff.comment:
Use this if you need a specific cutoff point (eg for labels) which the auto-cutoff is going over
0 is bottom, 380-410 is about halfway up US-letter/A4; Leave 0 for auto.
This only works on the first page of each order, as that is the page that we print integrated labels and 'fixed page-base' images.

page_background_image.label: Image file
page_background_image.comment: For full-page sharp backgrounds, upload images with dimensions 595pt x 842pt (A4), or 612pt x 792pt (Letter)

packed_by_yn.label: Show 'Packed by' note?
packed_by_yn.comment: Goes at page base - handy for QC

show_gift_wrap.label: Show Product Gift-Wrap Column?
show_gift_wrap.comment: This option will work if you have installed Gift Wrap feature of Magento Enterprise

show_gift_wrap_top_right.label: Show icon top-of-page for wrap orders?

split_bundles.label: Split & group bundle parents and children/simple-products separately

total_tax_incl_yn.label: Is this included in the Subtotal?

custom_message_image.label: Image file
custom_message_image.comment: Dimensions 540pt(A4)|562pt(US Letter) x 1-200pt @ 300dpi : non-interlaced and non-transparent .png

custom_message_image_nudge.label: Nudge
custom_message_image_nudge.comment: Eg. nudge it up off integrated labels

custom_message.label: Under product-list message
custom_message.comment: Good for tax numbers, return instructions

custom_message_yesbox.label: Under product-list message
custom_message_yesbox.comment: Good for tax numbers, return instructions

custom_message_filter.label: Show 'Message B' for this group :
custom_message_filter.comment: eg. put 'wholesale', then only wholesale customers will see 'Message B'

custom_messageB.label: Under product-list Message B
custom_messageB.comment: For any customer group containing filter word

notes_filter.label: Filter text (don't show notes containg this text)
notes_filter.comment:
Eg. enter 'Captured amount' to not show authorize.net payments
Separate multiple phrases by the pipe character: |

positional_message_box_fixed_position.label: Positionable box position
positional_message_box_fixed_position.comment: [250, 100] Need to select [Yes] on "Show order gift message" or "Show product gift message".

positional_remessage_box_fixed_position.label: Position
positional_remessage_box_fixed_position.comment: [250, 100] Need to select [Yes] on "Show order gift message" or "Show product gift message".

additional_action_change_order_status_yn.label: Change order status
additional_action_change_order_status_yn.comment: Can be handy to reduce customer support - eg. set to a custom Processing status of 'Packing your order now'

manual_processing_print_flag.label: Print orders once only?
manual_processing_print_flag.comment: Set a visual reminder of which orders have been printed, by setting 'Update shipEasy Flag' -> 'Yes, Printed'

auto_processing_check.label: Only process orders matching shipEasy attribute?

auto_processing_required_stock.label: Process orders that include out-of-stock items?

pickpack_shipaddress_maxpoints.comment: If you get long addresses that spill over the edge of your label, set this number to force a linebreak

tracking_number_barcode_fontsize.label: barcode font size

pickpack_second_bottom_shipping_address_.label: Add 2nd shipping address?

pickpack_bottom_shipping_address_yn_xtra.comment:
Good for 3-part integrated labels, eg. for peel-off address records
All linebreaks are stripped in this output

flat_address_margin_rt_xtra.label: Margin (from right) for flat-address
flat_address_margin_rt_xtra.comment: Use as a way to constrain the address inside a specific label or area

page_1_products_y_cutoff.comment:
Use this if you need a specific cutoff point (eg for labels) which the auto-cutoff is going over
0 is bottom, 380-410 is about halfway up US-letter/A4; Leave 0 for auto.
This only works on the first page of each order, as that is the page that we print integrated labels and 'fixed page-base' images.

page_background_image.label: Image file
page_background_image.comment: For full-page sharp backgrounds, upload images with dimensions 595pt x 842pt (A4), or 612pt x 792pt (Letter)

page_background_resize.label: High/Low Resolution?
page_background_resize.comment: Set to Low to keep filesize low (but background image blurred), set to High to get a sharp background (and larger filesize)

packed_by_yn.label: Add 'Packed by' note?
packed_by_yn.comment: Usually goes at page base - handy for QC

combine_custom_attribute_under_product.label: Combine custom product attributes under the product line?
combine_custom_attribute_under_product.comment: Ie. if you want them listed together and not in separate columns

show_gift_wrap.label: Show Product Gift-Wrap Column?
show_gift_wrap.comment: This option will work if you have installed Gift Wrap feature of Magento Enterprise

show_gift_wrap_top_right.label: Show icon top-of-page for wrap orders?

split_bundles.label: Split & group bundle parents and children/simple-products separately

total_tax_incl_yn.label: Is this included in the Subtotal?

custom_message_image.label: Image file
custom_message_image.comment: Dimensions 540pt(A4)|562pt(US Letter) x 1-200pt @ 300dpi : non-interlaced and non-transparent .png

custom_message_image_nudge.label: Nudge
custom_message_image_nudge.comment: Eg. nudge it up off integrated labels

custom_message.label: Under product-list message
custom_message.comment: Good for tax numbers, return instructions

custom_message_yesbox.label: Under product-list message
custom_message_yesbox.comment: Good for tax numbers, return instructions

custom_message_filter.label: Show 'Message B' for this group :
custom_message_filter.comment: eg. put 'wholesale', then only wholesale customers will see 'Message B'

custom_messageB.label: Under product-list Message B
custom_messageB.comment: For any customer group containing filter word

notes_filter.label: Filter text (don't show notes containg this text)
notes_filter.comment:
Eg. enter 'Captured amount' to not show authorize.net payments
Separate multiple phrases by the pipe character: |

positional_message_box_fixed_position.label: Positionable box position
positional_message_box_fixed_position.comment: [250, 100] Need to select [Yes] on "Show order gift message" or "Show product gift message".

positional_remessage_box_fixed_position.label: Position
positional_remessage_box_fixed_position.comment: [250, 100] Need to select [Yes] on "Show order gift message" or "Show product gift message".

additional_action_change_order_status_yn.label: Change order status
additional_action_change_order_status_yn.comment: Can be handy to reduce customer support - eg. set to a custom Processing status of 'Packing your order now'

manual_processing_print_flag.label: Print orders once only?
manual_processing_print_flag.comment: Set a visual reminder of which orders have been printed, by setting 'Update shipEasy Flag' -> 'Yes, Printed'

auto_processing_check.label: Only process orders matching shipEasy attribute?

auto_processing_required_stock.label: Process orders that include out-of-stock items?

auto_processing_check_2nd.label: Only process orders matching shipEasy attribute?

auto_processing_required_stock_2nd.label: Process orders that include out-of-stock items?

auto_processing_check_3rd.label: Only process orders matching shipEasy attribute?

auto_processing_required_stock_3rd.label: Process orders that include out-of-stock items?

shipping_address_background_shippingmeth.comment:
Rules are processed in order from low to high priority numbers.
If there are no matching rules, it will use the default.
Leave 'Pattern' and 'Priority' blank for default.
To setup "Country Groups", see that section in System > Config > shipEasy.

Making Labels : Standard Dimensions
---------------------------------------------------
Get one label printing well before making multiples!
Integrated label: 250pt x 200pt @ 300dpi : non-interlaced and non-transparent .png
Zebra (portrait): 288pt x 432pt @ 300dpi : non-interlaced and non-transparent .png
Royal Mail (portrait): 275pt x 442pt @ 300dpi (97 x 156mm) : non-interlaced and non-transparent .png
UPS (portrait): 288pt x 450pt @ 300dpi (4 x 6.25") : non-interlaced and non-transparent .png

pickpack_warehouse.comment: This option will work if you have installed warehouse extension.

pickpack_combine_attribute_separated.label: Combine the custom attributes listed below?

pickpack_shelving_separated.label: Custom attribute (1)
pickpack_shelving_separated.comment:
Attribute code (eg. for shelving info, maybe you have an attribute: shelf)
You need to have created this attribute, and assigned values for each product for it to work!

pickpack_shelving3_separated.label: Custom attribute (3)
pickpack_shelving3_separated.comment: Attribute code for shelving info; eg. shelf

separated_options_filter.label: Filter out these custom option SKUs :
separated_options_filter.comment: Comma-separated list of SKUs to *not* show

separated_options_count_filter.label: Don't count these custom option SKUs :
separated_options_count_filter.comment: Comma-separated list of SKUs to *not* show a count for

separated_options_filter_stacked.label: Filter out these custom option SKUs :
separated_options_filter_stacked.comment: Comma-separated list of SKUs to *not* show

separated_options_count_filter_stacked.label: Don't count these custom option SKUs :
separated_options_count_filter_stacked.comment: Comma-separated list of SKUs to *not* show a count for

pickpack_stock_separated.label: Show stock alert below...
pickpack_stock_separated.comment: Shows SKU in red if stock below this number

address_format.label: Address format
address_format.comment:
Structure: {if X}{X},|{/if}
Can use these codes:
{prefix}{name}{firstname}{lastname}{suffix}{company}{street}{city}{postcode}{country}
{street} - All lines of 'street'
{street1} - 1st line of 'street'
{street2} - 2nd line of 'street'
{region} - uses state abbreviation if available, else full name
{REGION} - all-caps (region only)
{region_full} - uses full state name
{region_code} - uses state abbreviation only
{COUNTRY} - all-caps (country only)
| = line break

capitalize_zebra_yn.label: Reformat?
capitalize_zebra_yn.comment: According to the USPS all addresses should be capitalised to improve delivery time and accuracy

address_countryskip.label: Hide this 'country name'
address_countryskip.comment: eg. put your country, then only overseas orders will have country added

fields.auto_processing_groupping:
select adminhtml/system_config_source_yesno 280500 1 1 1 Combine pdfsCombine pdfs config_bull_indent
1 day 1,2,3

use_courierrules_shipping_label.label: Use courierRules generated shipping label?
use_courierrules_shipping_label.comment: You need courierRules installed for this to work. This will use the specific label generated by courierRules.

label_logo.label: Background Image
label_logo.comment: Dimensions : 'Label width' x 'Label height' @ 300dpi : non-interlaced and non-transparent .png

label_nudgelogo.label: Nudge background image
label_nudgelogo.comment: This will move the image on each label

label_return_address.label: Return address text
label_return_address.comment: Start with 'From :' to have that a different size

label_return_address_side.label: Return address
label_return_address_side.comment:
Structure:
{{store_name}} Fixed Text {{store_vat_number}} etc.
Can use:
store_name, store_vat_number, store_return_address, store_email, store_phone

use_courierrules_shipping_label.label: Use courierRules generated shipping label?
use_courierrules_shipping_label.comment: You need courierRules installed for this to work. This will use the specific label generated by courierRules.

nudge_demension_zebra.label: Dimensions
nudge_demension_zebra.comment:
Default Label dimensions (portrait):
Zebra : 288 x 432pt
Royal Mail : 275 x 442pt (97 x 156mm)
UPS : 288 x 450pt (4 x 6.25")

fields.add_cn22_page_yn: translate="label comment" module="pickpack"> Add an autoCN22 page? config_bull_indent select pickpack/source_yesno 5120 1 1 1

final_zebra_summary.label: Add an order-summary label?
final_zebra_summary.comment: This will add an info label at the end of every print run.

address_format.label: Address format
address_format.comment:
Structure: {if x}{x},|{/if}
Can use these codes:
{prefix}{name}{firstname}{lastname}{suffix}{company}{street}{city}{postcode}{country}
{street} - All lines of 'street'
{street1} - 1st line of 'street'
{street2} - 2nd line of 'street'
{region} - state abbreviation if available, else full name
{REGION} - all-caps (region only)
{region_full} - full state name
{region_code} - state abbreviation only
{country}
{COUNTRY} - all-caps (country only)
| = line break

capitalize_zebra_yn.label: Reformat?
capitalize_zebra_yn.comment: According to the USPS all addresses should be capitalised to improve delivery time and accuracy

address_countryskip.label: Hide this 'country name'
address_countryskip.comment: eg. put your country, then only overseas orders will have country added

label_logo_yn2.label: Add shipping label image?
label_logo_yn2.comment:
Set in 'Shipping Labels' section
Enable this to show eg. Royal Mail PPI labels

label_return_address.label: Return address text
label_return_address.comment: Start with 'From :' to have that a different size

label_return_address_side.label: Return address text
label_return_address_side.comment:
Structure:
{{store_name}} Fixed Text {{store_vat_number}} etc.
Can use:
store_name, store_vat_number, store_return_address, store_email, store_phone

product_qty_upsize_yn.label: Upsize + bold qty, if qty = 2+
product_qty_upsize_yn.comment: If you ship a lot of single items, this can help alert your shipping staff that there's more than one!

separate_zebra_page_yn.label: Print products label after address label?

show_orderid_product_label.label: Show Order ID in product label?

only_print_once.label: Only print once?
only_print_once.comment:
If set to Yes, after an order has been printed, you can only re-print it from inside the Order Detail page.
The aim is to avoid shipping the same order multiple times by mistake.

csv_quote_values_yn.label: "Quote" all values in CSV exports?
csv_quote_values_yn.comment:
[Yes]
- If you have spreadsheet cells getting mixed up, check this is turned on.
- If set to Yes, set the spreadsheet importer to 'Fields de-limited by " character'.

csv_strip_linebreaks_yn.label: Strip linebreaks from non-address fields in CSV exports?
csv_strip_linebreaks_yn.comment:
[Yes]
- If you have slightly 'dirty data' (eg. product names with linebreaks in) set this to yes.

csv_encoding.label: CSV output encoding
csv_encoding.comment:
By default we output ANSI, which works well for Windows machines and special characters.
If you need UTF-8, just choose that here

column_mapping_csvorders.label: Column mapping
column_mapping_csvorders.comment:
Follow this format:
  • Column Name 1:%magento_order_attribute_here%;
  • Column Name 2:[fixed text here];
  • Column Name 3:%magento_order_attribute_here% %another_magento_order_attribute_here%;

You can use these attributes:
Order Info:
  • %base_order_subtotal%
  • %base_shipping_price%
  • %base_total_invoiced%
  • %base_total_paid%
  • %base_total_purchased%
  • %base_currency%
  • %comments_frontend_only%
  • %comments_unfiltered%
  • %comments%
  • %configurable_sku%
  • %coupon_code%
  • %coupon_label%
  • %customer_id%
  • %description%
  • %invoice_date%
  • %newsletter_subscription_status%
  • %order_date_plus48h%
  • %order_date%
  • %order_id%
  • %order_status%
  • %order_subtotal%
  • %order_tax_amount%
  • %order_currency%
  • %product_description%
  • %product_key%
  • %product_name%
  • %product_url%
  • %qty_items%
  • %shipping_price%
  • %short_description%
  • %simple_sku%
  • %store%
  • %store_id%
  • %store_view%
  • %today_date%
  • %total_invoiced%
  • %total_paid%
  • %total_price%
  • %cod_owed%
  • %total_purchased%
  • %tracking%
  • %unit_price%
  • %warehouse%
  • %website%
  • %website_id%
  • %weight%
  • %chanel_unity_origin%

Product Attribute:
attribute_code : List attribute values, separated by |
eg.
  • column-name:product_attribute_here;

Description:
%description% : List product names, separated by |
%description_qty% : List product names with qty prefix *eg. 2 x White shirt', separated by |
%description_categories% : List product category names, separated by |
Billing Info:
  • %bill_address%
  • %bill_city%
  • %bill_company%
  • %bill_country_code%
  • %bill_country%
  • %bill_email%
  • %bill_firstname%
  • %bill_fullname%
  • %bill_lastname%
  • %bill_postcode%
  • %bill_prefix%
  • %bill_region%
  • %bill_street1%
  • %bill_street2%
  • %bill_streets%
  • %bill_suffix%
  • %bill_telephone%
Shipping Info:
  • %ship_address%
  • %ship_city%
  • %ship_company%
  • %ship_country_code_2char%
  • %ship_country_code%
  • %ship_country%
  • %ship_email%
  • %ship_firstname%
  • %ship_fullname%
  • %ship_lastname%
  • %ship_method%
  • %ship_postcode%
  • %ship_prefix%
  • %ship_region%
  • %ship_street1%
  • %ship_street2%
  • %ship_streets%
  • %ship_suffix%
  • %ship_telephone%
  • %shipping_paid%
courierRules:
If installed, you can also use this:
  • %courierrules_shipping_method%
m2Epro:
If installed, you can also use these:
  • %amazon_order_id%
  • %ebay_final_fee%
  • %ebay_order_id%
  • %marketplace_id%
  • %marketplace_order_id%
  • %paypal_fee%
  • %paypal_transaction_id%
Channel Unity:
If installed, you can also use these:
  • %chanel_unity_origin%
retailExpress:
If installed, you can also use these:
  • %retail_express_id%
  • %retail_express_message%
  • %retail_express_status%
Order Weight:
  • %weight% : total weight as entered (eg '120')
  • %weight_kg_suffix%: total weight with 'kg' text suffixed (eg '120 kg')
  • %weight_lb_suffix%: total weight with 'lb' text suffixed (eg '120 lb')
  • %weight_kg_to_lb%: total weight converted from kg to lb (eg '264.55')
  • %weight_lb_to_kg%: total weight converted from lb to kg (eg '54.43')
  • %weight_kg_to_lb_suffix%: total weight converted from kg to lb, with 'lb' text suffixed (eg '264.55 lb')
  • %weight_lb_to_kg_suffix%: total weight converted from lb to kg, with 'kg' text suffixed (eg '54.43 kg')
  • %custom_weightbased_text% : See custom weight section below
  • %custom_weightbased_count% : See custom weight section below

address_format.label: 'ship-address' and 'bill-address' column format
address_format.comment:
Structure: {Attribute A},{Attribute B}
Can use these codes:
{ship_prefix}{ship_name}{ship_company}{ship_streets}{ship_street1}{ship_street2}{ship_street3} {ship_street4}{ship_city}{ship_postcode}{ship_country}{ship_country_code}{ship_country_code_2char}
{ship_region} - uses state abbreviation if available, else full name
{ship_region_full} - uses full state name
{ship_region_code} - uses state abbreviation only

date_format.label: Date format
date_format.comment: [M j, Y] Format this according to www.php.net/date

column_mapping.label: Column mapping
column_mapping.comment:
Follow this format:
  • column-name:special_product_attribute_here;
  • column-name-2:[fixed text here];
  • column-name-3:%special_attribute_here%;

You can use these attributes:
Order Info:
  • %base_order_subtotal%
  • %base_shipping_price%
  • %base_total_invoiced%
  • %base_total_paid%
  • %base_total_purchased%
  • %base_currency%
  • %comments_frontend_only%
  • %comments_unfiltered%
  • %comments%
  • %configurable_sku%
  • %coupon_code%
  • %coupon_label%
  • %description%
  • %invoice_date%
  • %order_date_plus48h%
  • %order_date%
  • %order_id%
  • %order_status%
  • %order_subtotal%
  • %order_tax_amount%
  • %order_currency%
  • %product_description%
  • %product_key%
  • %product_name%
  • %product_url%
  • %qty%
  • %shipping_price%
  • %short_description%
  • %simple_sku%
  • %store%
  • %store_id%
  • %store_view%
  • %today_date%
  • %total_invoiced%
  • %total_paid%
  • %total_price%
  • %total_purchased%
  • %tracking%
  • %unit_price%
  • %warehouse%
  • %website%
  • %website_id%
  • %weight%
  • %chanel_unity_origin%

Product Attribute:
  • column-name:product_attribute_here;
Order Weight:
  • %weight% : total weight as entered (eg '120')
  • %custom_weightbased_text% : See custom weight section below
  • %custom_weightbased_count% : See custom weight section below
Billing Info:
  • %bill_city%
  • %bill_company%
  • %bill_country_code%
  • %bill_country%
  • %bill_email%
  • %bill_firstname%
  • %bill_fullname%
  • %bill_lastname%
  • %bill_postcode%
  • %bill_prefix%
  • %bill_region%
  • %bill_street1%
  • %bill_street2%
  • %bill_streets%
  • %bill_suffix%
  • %bill_telephone%
Shipping Info:
  • %ship_address%
  • %ship_city%
  • %ship_company%
  • %ship_country_code_2char%
  • %ship_country_code%
  • %ship_country%
  • %ship_email%
  • %ship_firstname%
  • %ship_fullname%
  • %ship_lastname%
  • %ship_method%
  • %ship_postcode%
  • %ship_prefix%
  • %ship_region%
  • %ship_street1%
  • %ship_street2%
  • %ship_streets%
  • %ship_suffix%
  • %ship_telephone%
  • %shipping_paid%
courierRules:
If installed, you can also use this:
  • %courierrules_shipping_method%
m2Epro:
If installed, you can also use these:
  • %amazon_order_id%
  • %ebay_final_fee%
  • %ebay_order_id%
  • %marketplace_id%
  • %marketplace_order_id%
  • %paypal_fee%
  • %paypal_transaction_id%
Channel Unity:
If installed, you can also use these:
  • %chanel_unity_origin%
retailExpress:
If installed, you can also use these:
  • %retail_express_id%
  • %retail_express_message%
  • %retail_express_status%

date_format.label: Date format
date_format.comment: [M j, Y] Format this according to www.php.net/date

pre_cells.label: Pre-cells
pre_cells.comment:
Follow this format:
[cell A1 contents][cell B1 contents]
[cell A2 contents][cell B2 contents]
This text will come above the product breakdown
You can use these attributes: %date%
Add these at the beginning of a cell to format that cell:
'{b}'- bold, '{u}' - underline, '{i}'- italic
'{ub}' - underline + bold, '{ubi}' - underline + bold + italic
'{h1}' - Heading1 (Bigger + bold)
'{h2}' - Heading2 (Bigger + bold)
'{h1-i}' - Heading1 Italic (Bigger + bold + italic)
'{h2-i}' - Heading2 Italic (Bigger + bold + italic)
'{merge}' - Merge with next cell
'{merge2}' - Merge with next 2 cells
'{b-rt}' - bold, right-aligned
'{b-lt}' - bold, left-aligned
'{rt}' - right-aligned
'{lt}' - left-aligned

column_mapping.comment:

group_manifest_by_category_yn.label: Group by Category?
group_manifest_by_category_yn.comment: This will group all products by their category (useful for outbound customs declarations)

category_translation.label: Category translation
category_translation.comment:
Follow this format:
original magento category-A name:displayed category-A name;
original magento category-B name:displayed category-B name;
--------------------
You can use this to simplify/expand displayed categories for customs. Eg. 'Large Shirts' and 'Medium Shirts' could become 'Cotton Shirts'

name_display_choice_attribute_separated.label: Attribute to use as product name

cost_multiplier.label: Cost multiplier
cost_multiplier.comment:
Default: 1
Eg. Change the display cost to match your actual end costs

cost_base_to_display_rate.label: Cost (base) to (display) exchange rate
cost_base_to_display_rate.comment:
Default: 1
Eg. your base currency is USD, your manifest display currency is GBP : enter the exchange rate multiplier for USD -> GBP

is_excel_yn.label: Output Excel XML file (instead of CSV)

date_format.label: Date format
date_format.comment: [M j, Y] Format this according to www.php.net/date
